name: Milton Nelson WARD, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Milton Nelson WARD, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals for further consideration in light of Class v. United States, 583 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 798, 200 L.Ed.2d 37 (2018).
casebody.head_matter:
Milton Nelson WARD, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 17-8526.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 1, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals for further consideration in light of Class v. United States, 583 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 798, 200 L.Ed.2d 37 (2018).
